headline: Why Polestar Stock Rocked the Market Today
summary: Electric vehicle (EV) stocks got quite a charge on Friday thanks to good news coming from one of their more prominent players.  The manufacturer with the happy news was Polestar peer Rivian (NASDAQ: RIVN).  On Friday, the pickup truck and SUV specialist released its production and delivery figures for both the fourth quarter of 2024 and the entirety of that year.

headline: What Car Sales Can Tell Us About the U.S. Auto Market Right Now
summary: Demand for pickup trucks and hybrid vehicles helped automakers increase deliveries, but challenges loom for 2025.
